docs.abstract: In this lesson, students will examine the demographic profile of their own generation - 'Gen Y' - to assess the role it plays in new marketing strategies.
docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.
docs.snippet: In this lesson, students will examine the demographic profile of their own generation - 'Gen Y' - to assess the role it plays in new marketing strategies.

docs.abstract: David Brubaker letter says Jeffrey Steingarten (April 3 Op-Ed) should also consider impact of American high-fat diet on the environment (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Jeffrey Steingarten (Op-Ed, April 3) should consider the full impact of the American high-fat diet not only on human health but also on the environment.
docs.snippet: To the Editor:    Jeffrey Steingarten (Op-Ed, April 3) should consider the full impact of the American high-fat diet not only on human health but also on the environment.
